website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a hydraulic press that's perfect for use in home workshops, this tabletop model may be exactly what you need.
pros: Takes up less space and is straightforward to use
mounts on a table or bench
Has a reasonably sturdy build for a 6-ton press
cons: provides less leverage and durability than full-size presses

customer_reviews.title: Thought I was getting good jecs. Apparently not
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why I'm not giving it 1 star is because it didn't completely fail at pressing IN bushings. Pressing out bushings is impossible. Ram rod crushes easily. Space between Arbor legs is perfectly inconvenient for everything I've tried so far. Ram spins on bed plate. Build quality is ass. Cast iron Arbor plates shatter. No spot to put the handle lever. Have had good luck with jecs in the past but this one is just terrible. update, tried using again today to push out small on rear knuckle bushings, absolutely failed. this tool is nearly useless
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very poor packaging and quality control but JEGS will make it right
customer_reviews.text: The box came very battered and the bottle jack leaked and wouldn't pump up. After assembly (easy, although not the greatest construction), I found that the bottle jack was no good. I contacted JEGS and they were quick to ship me a replacement bottle jack (at not cost). Unfortunately, this did leave me with scrap metal (the bottle jack) to deal with but at least they didn't have to send me a whole new press! In short, this is a great deal but if you're pressed for time you might find yourself up a creek waiting for replacement parts to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Wil Thieme

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Beat up when arrived. Box was badly damaged. No attaching hardware left inside, no work plates. Pretty much useless now.
customer_reviews.author: johnathon e pelletier

customer_reviews.title: nice press. great quality
customer_reviews.text: I used this press to push out and replace the bushings on my 350Z suspension. worked flawless.
customer_reviews.author: J benz

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and already came attached up
customer_reviews.text: Considering I bought this new and the bottlenjack and parts are all scratched up is kinda annoying. I'm also missing parts. I didnt revives the two steel plates that cross the adjust beam . I havnt used it yet and I'm starting to considering returning it already.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Fricke

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions and weak press crossmembers.
customer_reviews.text: Cross members to place items on bent and do not secure well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: I will buy next shop tool from JEGS!
customer_reviews.text: Once we got all the parts and JEGS assistance with assembly everything was great! The press worked as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing the parts that make it a press
customer_reviews.text: So I finally received the press (after almost a month to get here) box had half a roll of tape holding it together. Opened it up, missing some pretty important parts like the bottle jack and the cross member to hold the press plate on (those were missing as well). I have already emailed requesting the parts to make it actually work. This has unfortunately pushed my project back probably another 2 weeks. Not real impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip S

customer_reviews.title: It works for low load jobs. Be careful if you go a anywhere near limit.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the cross beams bend on me while I was using the press. Be careful how you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hemingson

customer_reviews.title: this product is a fraud
customer_reviews.text: When assembled it turned out to be a mini press. This does not help me to replace car bearings. This mini press is not useful for my work
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived earlier than expected, which is good, but was missing the jack handle and both steel plates for the bottom. I had extra jack handles and some plate steel that I was able to use, but had I not, it would have been useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Missing half the parts product is useless
customer_reviews.text: I do not have any bolts to put it together or springs for the jack to hang and it’s missing a leg piece so this product is essentially useless at the moment
customer_reviews.author: jordan n.

customer_reviews.title: Do it yourself and do it right and save a lot of money
customer_reviews.text: For pressing bearings out of and back in cast aluminum harley parts .worked fine. Fixed my Bike
customer_reviews.author: kelly stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very solid, worth what it costs
customer_reviews.text: Nice, well crafted, but it isn’t about 2.5’ high. I honestly thought it would be taller.
customer_reviews.author: John Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Great for small work area’s
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use I have used it on UTV bearings and ATV works good.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the job! Used it to press my hub bearings on a 08 accord
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Package was damaged missing springs pins and bolts not happy
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Burcham Sr

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Missing almost all the parts needed to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

product_meta.title: JEGS 81518 Hydraulic Shop Press 6-Ton Bench Top Mount
product_meta.description:
Hydraulic Shop Press 

6-TonBench Top MountWorking Range: Up to 18 in.Overall: 15.375 in. W x 19.75 in. D x 36.5 in. HWeight: 60 lbs.Red SteelIncludes (2) 5.25 in. x 2.75 in. Press Plates Features for JEGS 6-Ton Shop Press:

Open construction allows work on long piecesBolted, adjustable cross beams raise and lower for an ideal working distanceHeavy-duty springs quickly return the ramPress plate bar is the perfect size for bushings and bearings
